title: TC001_Login_Successful_Valid_Credentials
given: A pre-registered, active user account must exist in the system.
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page. And Enter a valid, registered username in the username field. And Enter the corresponding correct password in the password field.
expected: User is authenticated and redirected to the application's main dashboard or home page.

title: TC002_Login_Failed_Invalid_Password
given: A pre-registered user account must exist.
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page. And Enter a valid, registered username. And Enter an incorrect password.
expected: An appropriate error message (e.g., 'Invalid username or password.') is displayed. The user remains on the login page.

title: TC003_Login_Failed_Invalid_Username
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page. And Enter a username that is not registered in the system. And Enter any password.
expected: A generic error message (e.g., 'Invalid username or password.') is displayed to prevent user enumeration. The user remains on the login page.

title: TC004_Login_Failed_Empty_Credentials
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page. And Leave the username field blank. And Leave the password field blank.
expected: Client-side validation errors appear, prompting the user to enter a username and password (e.g., 'This field is required'). The login request is not sent to the server.

title: TC005_Login_Username_Case_Insensitivity
given: A valid user account with a known username (e.g., valid_user@example.com) must exist.
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page. And Enter a valid username but in a different letter case (e.g., uppercase or mixed case). And Enter the corresponding correct password.
expected: User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard, confirming the username is case-insensitive.

title: TC006_Login_Password_Case_Sensitivity
given: A valid user account with a known password (e.g., ValidPassword123!) must exist.
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page. And Enter a valid username. And Enter the correct password but with incorrect letter casing.
expected: Login fails and an 'Invalid username or password.' error is displayed, confirming the password field is case-sensitive.

title: TC007_Login_Password_Field_Masking
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page. And Click on the password field.
then: Type a sequence of characters into the password field.
expected: The characters entered in the password field are obscured (e.g., displayed as dots or asterisks) and not shown in plain text.

title: TC008_Login_Forgot_Password_Link_Functionality
when: Navigate to the HMH Ed login page.
then: Locate and click on the 'Forgot Password?' link.
expected: The user is successfully redirected to the password recovery page or modal.
